 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּד‎</span>] **verb** probably ==return, go about, repeat, do again== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***return, do again*** IV. ***restore***, also ***say again, iterate***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***habit***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turn about, surround***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***circuit, circle***; Syriac Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***accustom***, Ethpe\`el, Aph\`el ***be accustomed***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***usage, ceremong***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***festival*** ([[BDB#Brock|Brock]]), whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, as loan-word, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>276</sup>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עידא‎</span> ***usage*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>337</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>90</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵד‎</span>, and especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדוּת‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיד‎</span> ***festival***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִידָא‎</span>; compare probably Assyrian Shaph\`el ***uš-id***, he ***he solemnly affirmed*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 32</sup>); — only intensive : **Pi\`el** ***surround*** (compare Ethiopic), ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְּדֻנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.61|Ps 119:61]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְבָבוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.18.6|Ps 18:6]]). **Pol\`el**, ***restore, relieve*** (compare Arabic IV.), ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוֺדֵד‎</span>, with accusative of person [[Ps.146.9|Ps 146:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַר‎</span>, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוֵּת‎</span>), [[Ps.147.6|Ps 147:6]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁפִּיל‎</span>). **Hithpolel** ***be restored, Imperfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַנִּתְעוֺדָּ֑ד‎</span> [[Ps.20.9|Ps 20:9]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַל‎</span>; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἀνωρθώθημεν</span>. 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּד‎</span>] **verb denominative** ([[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>42 f.</sup>) ==bear witness==; — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲעוּדֵךְ‎</span> [[Lam.2.13|Lam 2:13]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; &lt; **Hiph\`il** [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִיד‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.15|2Kgs 17:15]]; [[Mal.2.14|Mal 2:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִד‎</span> [[Gen.43.3|Gen 43:3]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַהעִי֫דֹתָ‎</span> [[Neh.9.34|Neh 9:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַהעֵדֹ֫תָה‎</span> [[Exod.19.23|Exod 19:23]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַהעִידֹ֫תִי‎</span> [[Deut.4.26|Deut 4:26]]; [[Jer.42.19|Jer 42:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִ֫ידוּ‎</span> [[Neh.9.26|Neh 9:26]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫עַד‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.13|2Kgs 17:13]]; [[Zech.3.6|Zech 3:6]] 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּעִידֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Job.29.11|Job 29:11]] + 15 t. Imperfect; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֵד‎</span> [[Gen.43.3|Gen 43:3]] + 4 t.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֵד‎</span> [[Exod.19.21|Exod 19:21]] + 2 t. Imperative ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִיד‎</span> [[Deut.32.46|Deut 32:46]]. — 

**1.** ***testify, bear witness***, with suffix against one [[1Kgs.21.10|1Kgs 21:10]]; [[1Kgs.21.13|1Kgs 21:13]] in favour of [[Job.29.11|Job 29:11]]; [[Lam.2.13|Lam 2:13]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין‎</span> [[Mal.2.14|Mal 2:14]]. 

**2.** ***cause to testify, take as witness***, with accusative of person [[Isa.8.2|Isa 8:2]]; [[Jer.32.10|Jer 32:10]]; [[Jer.32.25|Jer 32:25]]; [[Jer.32.44|Jer 32:44]] ***call as witness, invoke***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎את השׁמים ואת הארץ‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***against*** [[Deut.4.26|Deut 4:26]]; [[Deut.30.19|Deut 30:19]]; [[Deut.31.28|Deut 31:28]]. 

**3.** ***protest, affirm solemnly, warn:*** subject men, absolute [[Jer.6.10|Jer 6:10]]; [[Neh.13.15|Neh 13:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person [[Gen.43.3|Gen 43:3]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.19.21|Exod 19:21]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[1Sam.8.9|1Sam 8:9]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.2.42|1Kgs 2:42]]; [[2Chr.24.19|2Chr 24:19]]; [[Neh.9.26|Neh 9:26]]; [[Neh.13.21|Neh 13:21]]; [[Jer.42.19|Jer 42:19]]; [[Amos.3.13|Amos 3:13]] ***exhort solemnly, admonish, charge***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person, [[Exod.19.23|Exod 19:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Deut.8.19|Deut 8:19]]; [[2Kgs.17.13|2Kgs 17:13]]; [[Neh.9.29|Neh 9:29]]; [[Neh.9.30|Neh 9:30]]; [[Jer.11.7|Jer 11:7]] (3 t. in verse); [[Zech.3.6|Zech 3:6]]; [[Ps.50.7|Ps 50:7]]; [[Ps.81.9|Ps 81:9]] ***enjoin solemnly***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person + accusative of thing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדְוֺת‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.15|2Kgs 17:15]]; [[Neh.9.34|Neh 9:34]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דברים‎</span> [[Deut.32.46|Deut 32:46]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהוּעַד‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.21.29|Exod 21:29]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) impersonal ***and protest be entered***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person
